key.name: systemd-slice
key.summary: If BobLauncher is running in a systemd session, it will use this slice for launched apps. The string must include the suffix ".slice". If empty or invalid, launched programs will use the same slice as BobLauncher

key.name: enabled
key.description: For supported compositors, enable Layershell. Requires a restart to take effect.

key.name: points
key.description: The last stored x and y position of BobLauncher. Used internally.

key.name: anchor-points
key.description: Snap around these display percentages

key.name: anchor-snap-threshold
key.description: The drag threshold in pixels

key.name: hide-after-dnd-success
key.summary: Hide BobLauncher after successful drag and drop
key.description: Whether BobLauncher will hide after a successful drag and drop operation. This is disabled by default when the window is inactive

key.name: box-size
key.description: The maximum number of result rows displayed in the launcher window. The number of visible rows might be shorter, if there are not enough matches.

key.name: shortcut-indicator
key.description: The text shown before the row number on the right side of matches.

key.name: css-sheet
key.description: Path to a custom CSS file for styling the launcher interface. If empty, the default stylesheet will be used. See github for the default stylesheet.

key.name: match-description-next-to-title
key.description: If true, shows match descriptions next to titles (Krunner style). If false, shows them below (Alfred style).

key.name: client-side-border
key.description: Whether BobLauncher should try to draw its own borders. If you use your own stylesheet, this won't work.

key.name: client-side-shadow
key.description: Whether BobLauncher should try to draw its own shadow. If you use your own stylesheet, this won't work.

key.name: activate
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to hide BobLauncher window.

key.name: execute
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to execute the currently selected item.

key.name: execute-without-hide
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to execute the selected item without hiding the launcher window.

key.name: delete-char-backward
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to delete the character before the cursor.

key.name: delete-char-forward
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to delete the character after the cursor.

key.name: delete-word
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to delete the word before the cursor.

key.name: next-match
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to go to the next match in the results list.

key.name: prev-match
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to go to the previous match in the results list.

key.name: first-match
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to go to the first match in the results list.

key.name: last-match
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to go to the last match in the results list.

key.name: page-up
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to scroll up one page in the results list.

key.name: page-down
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to scroll down one page in the results list.

key.name: next-pane
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to switch to the next pane or section in the launcher.

key.name: prev-pane
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to switch to the previous pane or section in the launcher.

key.name: clear-search-or-hide
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to clear the search input or hide the launcher if the input is empty.

key.name: paste
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to paste text from the clipboard into the search input.

key.name: paste-selection
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to paste the currently selected text into the search input.

key.name: quit
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to completely exit the BobLauncher application.

key.name: highlight-match
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to highlight matches or activate a special highlight mode.

key.name: highlight-match-release
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to deactivate the match highlight feature when released.

key.name: match-1
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the first match in the results list.

key.name: match-2
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the second match in the results list.

key.name: match-3
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the third match in the results list.

key.name: match-4
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the fourth match in the results list.

key.name: match-5
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the fifth match in the results list.

key.name: match-6
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the sixth match in the results list.

key.name: match-7
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the seventh match in the results list.

key.name: match-8
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the eighth match in the results list.

key.name: match-9
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the ninth match in the results list.

key.name: match-10
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to select the tenth match in the results list.

key.name: sneak-peek
key.description: Shows a preview of the file if supported by your system

key.name: sneak-peek-release
key.description: Keyboard shortcuts to deactivate the match highlight feature when released.
